    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public UploadcareFile upload()
                      throws UploadFailureException
        Synchronously uploads the file to Uploadcare. The calling thread will be busy until the upload is finished. Uploadcare is polled every 500 ms for upload progress.
        Specified by:
        upload in interface Uploader
        Returns:
        An Uploadcare file
        Throws:
        UploadFailureException

      • uploadAsync

        public void uploadAsync(UploadcareFileCallback callback)
                 throws UploadFailureException
        Specified by:

        Throws:

      • upload

        public UploadcareFile upload(int pollingInterval)
                      throws UploadFailureException
        Synchronously uploads the file to Uploadcare. The calling thread will be busy until the upload is finished.
        Parameters:
        pollingInterval - Progress polling interval in ms
        Returns:
        An Uploadcare file
        Throws:
        UploadFailureException

      • store

        public UrlUploader store(boolean store)
        Store the file upon uploading.
        Specified by:
        store in interface Uploader
        Parameters:
        store - is set true - store the file upon uploading. Requires “automatic file storing” setting to be enabled. is set false - do not store file upon uploading.
